org.jclouds.ec2.services
Interface SecurityGroupAsyncClient

All Known Subinterfaces:
AWSSecurityGroupAsyncClient
public interface SecurityGroupAsyncClient

Provides access to EC2 via their REST API.

Author:
Adrian Cole
